items.sentence: Would you be so kind as to give me your phone number?
Please forgive me for opening your letter by mistake.
I know it's not easy, but you've got to at least try.
It's necessary for all members to follow these rules.
Lots of people have tried to do that without success.
I won't divorce you unless you give me a good reason.
You'll have to wait at least an hour to get a ticket.
As long as you keep quiet, you can stay in this room.
You shouldn't keep towels and cleaning rags together.
Could you go to the supermarket and buy us some wine?
